about_the_game:
This game requires an Xbox-style controller for every player (2-4 total)!

Spoop Troop is an asymmetric casual horror game for the whole family!
Play as an investigator or a ghostly spirit and complete your objective before the clock hits zero!
As a paranormal investigator, use your unique stats to your advantage and search each haunted site. While searching, you'll need to restore power to the building, unlock the gate, and prepare the trap. Busting really is that simple! Or is it?
Ghosts will do everything within their power to stop the investigators, including scaring them to death! As the ghost, your goal is to eliminate all other players or avoid capture, lasting until the timer runs out!

It's dangerous to go alone, so you should take some friends!
  • 10+ investigators with unique stats to choose from!
  • 5+ ghostly spirits with unique stats and abilities!
  • 5+ haunted sites to scare your friends and family at!
  • Additional perks for investigators and ghosts to choose to make each match feel unique!
  • Use gloworbs, EMF meters, spirit boxes, motion detectors, REM pods, and your trusty repulsor to help you reel in each paranormal threat!
  • Unlocks!
  • No microtransactions, it's just FREE!
  • An amazing soundtrack including tracks by Badass Wolf Shirt and CSKTS!

Welcome to the Spoop Troop!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Spoop Troop is a 2-4 player couch co-op/pvp asymmetric casual horror game. Got it? Good! Now get in the van - we're busting ghosts!
